title: Buddhify & Beyond
subTitle: How a side-project turned into a cult app success & what happens next
talk: Rohan is the creative director of Mindfulness Everywhere, the makers of the best-selling mindfulness app buddhify. In 2012, Wired magazine list him as one of 50 people who will change the world
Buddhify reached has reached #1 Health & Fitness app in 40 countries to date and has won multiple awards including 2014 App of the Year in the Scottish Digital Business Awards
